summary: AN ORDINANCE transferring partial jurisdiction over certain City (Department of Parks and Recreation) real property in Block 2, West Side Addition to West Seattle, together with portion of vacated 27th Avenue Southwest, and in Section 24, Township 24 North, Range 3 East, W.M., to the Engineering Department for construction and maintenance of a culvert with appurtenances, in conjunction with the Longfellow Creek at Southwest Brandon Street Improvements project. (R/W 8712).
